item.title: Matlab 离散数据的高斯分布曲线绘制

item.title: Matlab读取处理Excel数据并拟合正态分布曲线
item.description: clc,clear,close; % 导入数据 data = xlsread(‘5555.xlsx’,1); RealWidth = data(:,2); DetectWidth = data(:,1); D_Value = DetectWidth - RealWidth; % 求 D_Value 平均值 % 绘制散点图像 subplot(2,1,1); plot(D_Value,’*’); title(‘垂直库位停车后相对位置误差离散图&rsquo

About Me Ambrose Hi, I’m Ambrose, an automotive engineer and a passionate YouTuber. I focus on vehical and cutting-edge technology, with a particular interest in autonomous driving. Additionally, I have a strong enthusiasm for aerospace and consumer electronics. If you share my interests, please follow my YouTube channel where I share all things I love.
